https://github.com/barryvdh/laravel-snappy/issues/10
Copy wkhtmltopdf-amd64 to '/usr/local/bin/' (in the vm of course).
sudo chmod +x wkhtmltopdf-amd64

Setup font
https://thajegan76.wordpress.com/category/laravel/
yum install urw-fonts libXext libXrender fontconfig libfontconfig.so.1

Thailand
https://howtoinstall.co/en/ubuntu/trusty/xfonts-thai

With docker
PORTAL
docker-compose exec php cp /var/www/html/mado_akagane_phase2_src/vendor/h4cc/wkhtmltopdf-amd64/bin/wkhtmltopdf-amd64 /usr/local/bin
docker-compose exec php chmod +x /usr/local/bin/wkhtmltopdf-amd64

GENERAL
docker-compose exec php cp /var/www/html/all_purpose_src/vendor/h4cc/wkhtmltopdf-amd64/bin/wkhtmltopdf-amd64 /usr/local/bin
docker-compose exec php chmod +x /usr/local/bin/wkhtmltopdf-amd64


TOSTEM
wget https://downloads.wkhtmltopdf.org/0.12/0.12.5/wkhtmltox_0.12.5-1.stretch_amd64.deb
apt-get install -y xfonts-base
apt-get install -y xfonts-75dpi
dpkg -i wkhtmltox_0.12.5-1.stretch_amd64.deb
apt -f install

chmod 777 -R /home/centos/docker/src/tostem_src/public/tostem/pdf	

------------
TH site IT chưa có chạy lại docker (do chạy lâu) thì đang thiếu libssl1.0-dev
Xử lý như sau :
docker ps
docker exec -it xxx sh
apt-get remove libssl-dev
apt-get update
apt-get install libssl1.0-dev
